buffer.blob.constructor.history.[1].deta: Added the standard `endings` option to replace line-endings, and removed the non-standard `encoding` option.
buffer.blob.constructor.params.[0].detai: An array of string, {ArrayBuffer}, {TypedArray}, {DataView}, or {Blob} objects, or any mix of such objects, that will be stored within the `Blob`.
buffer.blob.constructor.params.[0].param: One of either `'transparent'` or `'native'`. When set to `'native'`, line endings in string source parts will be converted to the platform native line-ending as specified by `require('node:os').EOL`.
The Blob content-type. The intent is for `type` to convey the MIME media type of the data, however no validation of the type format is performed.
